input.sentences: we washed our baby in the sink .
then we fed her some fresh milk .
next | my husband brought through some fresh beer .
we toasted some nice beer in wine glasses .
then we shared a lovely meal together .
output.sentences: Before dinner, Tom and Jane washed their baby in the sink.
After bath time, the baby was fresh and clean and ready to be fed.
Baby got put to bed and then Jane's husband brought beers and poured himself fresh beer.
Tom also poured some nice wine and toasted to having a nice evening together.
Tom and Jane shared a lovely meal together, enjoying their time as a couple.
